CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Coilgun sabot
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Uses a discarding sabot to fire an undersized projectile at higher muzzle velocities, greatly improving armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Coilgun Ion
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Uses a discarding sabot to fire an undersized projectile at higher muzzle velocities, greatly improving armor penetration. These ones have been modified specifically to disable electronics, reducing penetration but increasing versatility.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Coilgun Explosive AP
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Uses a discarding sabot to fire an undersized projectile at higher muzzle velocities, greatly improving armor penetration. These ones contain a small explosive charge, reducing penetration but increasing lethality.
